name: Thomas Golden
text: I believe that I found one of the most honest mechanics in huntsville,please share this as this is so rare.I am totally satisfied with their work and knowledge.Gave me his honest opinion and stated they wouldn't fix it if it doesn't need to be fixed.People are friendly and courteous.Prices are right too!!!

name: nardrebel
text: Speedy service and fantastic crew. Thank you Lacey and Martin. This is my new go-to garage. An absolute pleasure.

name: Cynthia Spatz
text: Fast and friendly service.  They fixed my daughter's a/c in her vehicle in no time.  A little pricy,  but quality service.  Recommend.

resp.text:
We appreciate your business
Thanks,
TAG Auto Repair

name: Intentional Wanderer
text: Called numerous times to get a quote. Never got called back.

name: Jimmy Earskine
text: Rep talked as if she didn't wanna work on my vehicle 🤷🏾‍♂️ and quickly hung up.

resp.text:
There are some vehicles with certain issues that we're currently unable to work on at this time due to being short staffed.We apologize about your experience.We strive to have great customer service and try to point people in the correct direction when it comes to auto repair needs.We will resolve the issue.
Thanks,
TAG Auto Repair

name: robin wellington
text: Best place to get your car fixed.

name: Randy Manus
text: So they charge 2.5 hours to change a part that other shops charge .8 hours.  And refused to out a rebuilt part on an older car,even with new part only one year warranty.  They claim o Reilly will only give them one year warranty I called o Reilly and that's not true.  Just feel taken advantage of by someone that knows I am from out of town and have no option.

name: Chuck Cornwell
text: Awesome staff and professional mechanics. They are the best. Done an awesome brake job even though I am a 100% Trump supporter. 👍

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 star rating!We appreciate your business here at TAG Auto Repair.

name: Brian Harrison
text: Decades ago, I was recommended to go to TAG by a neighbor who said that even as a single woman she always felt that they were honest with her.  Time moves on.  There is now a woman in charge.  And after all this time, they are still awesome.  Highly recommend.

resp.text:
We appreciate your business over the years and look forward to continue being your auto repair shop.
Thank you from the Team at TAG Auto Repair

name: Mikkel Martin
text:
tag has worked on several of my vehicles and has made sure that i was taken care of, and back on the road again in a timely manner.
i would and have recommend them to anyone i know that needs automotive repair work done.
the mechanics are very knowledgeable and have been working on vehicles for years with lots of experience. i trust them when they tell me what they find wrong and what they need to do to repair my vehicles.

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 star rating! We appreciate your business here at TAG Auto Repair.

name: Brindley Goodger
text: Quick & affordable service. Honest folks! Lacey is the best!! Can't recommend them enough! (Also, owned by a woman!)

resp.text: Thank You Mrs.Goodger We appreciate your business and we are glad we were able to help with your vehicle needs.We look forward to you being part of the team here at TAG Auto Repair.

name: L J
text: I've been using TAG since 1994 and have been very satisfied. Trust, respect and quality of work is what I value most from TAG. I will not let any other shop work on my cars.    LJ

resp.text:
We appreciate your business over the years and look forward to continue being your auto repair shop.
Thank you from the Team at TAG Auto Repair

name: Mark Hopper
text:
I have used Tag Automotive for over 10 years with various vehicles. The consideration and care given to my autos is fantastic. TAG AUTO REPAIR will not add unnecessary repairs to drive the price up and they will look for the most efficient and BEST parts available on the market.

They have become great friends over the years ! Thanks TAG AUTOMOTIVE REPAIR !

resp.text: Thank you Mr.Hopper we appreciate all of your business.

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 star rating! We appreciate your business here at TAG Auto Repair.

resp.text: Thank you from the team at TAG Auto Repair Mr.Kelly King we look forward gaining your business and insuring your vehicle is well taken care of.

text: My husband purchased me a 2009 Cadillac cts fulky loaded. I've had it for one month. I needed a wheel bearing assembly. I took my car to Lacey and within 2 hours my car was fixed not only that it was my bday.

text: Took vehicle in for repair one month later same problem owner charged me over a thousand bucks for ac blower motor and my sir still doesn't work,took back to him and was told I would have to pay again.

name: David Harris
text: Morning Breakfast during the week  . Clean and fresh  restrooms 🚻  . Wheelchair accessible to all areas  . Free parking  .  Friendly people work there  . This place is also Known as  ( The End of the Road  )

text: The absolute worst experience. Be sure and get a quote first!

name: Mike Sanford
text: Russell is awesome and his wife Kim, who runs the office, is great too.  Always willing to help out.  My go to for any and all diesel service.

text: R and S Diesel Repair are awesome.   They are very knowledgeable and helpful.  Going the extra mile to make sure myself and their people are taken care of.   Would recommend hands down.

text: Great people

text: So good
