text: Good deal

name: Sandy Rosson
text: Dg

name: Michael Thompson
text: Good service

name: Michal Hirtl
text:
I would like to leave 5* review for world class auto repair. They did great and quick job on my car. The nicest people you can meet, thrilled to help you and fix you car for you for reasonable price.
They have my trust, if something goes wrong with my car, I know where I will go to get it fixed....World Class Auto Repair.
Thank you !!

resp.text: Thank you, Michal! This thoughtful review means a lot to us and we're honored to have your trust. Thank you for giving our team the opportunity to care for your vehicle. Until next time, drive safe!

name: Leta Herring
text: I have used World Class Auto for over 15 years. They are professional and always take excellent care of my cars, including my one owner,  perfect 1999 Mercedes  E 300 turbo diesel which was towed to the shop due to starter not working. The towing company damaged the body of car and the steering ans World Class Auto worked diligently to find the parts and repair my car.  I do not believe any other repair shop would have worked so hard. If you love your car, this is the place to take care of it.

resp.text: Thank you for the thoughtful review, Leta! We are always grateful for the opportunity to care for your cars, and we're very glad we could assist you with your Mercedes E 300 trubo diesel's repair needs. As always, if there's anything else we can do for you, please don't hesitate to reach out! Until next time, take care and drive safe!

name: Joan Kersh
text: Thank you so much A+ I will tell the world. Take your vehicle to World Class Auto Repair being retired and on a fixed income thanks again. A+  with  5 stars

resp.text: That means a lot to us, Joan! Thank you for choosing World Class Auto Repair for your vehicle's services. We appreciate your A+ and 5 star ratings and very much look forward to working with you again in the future. Take care!

name: Ashley Sanford
text: I have been using World Auto for years now starting with my 3 series BMW and now my 5 series, they have the BEST service! Usually bmw charges me an arm and a leg to get minor work done, but world auto gives me great prices and are so quick to keep you updated and get your car back quicker. Would highly recommend.

resp.text: Ashley, thank you so much for recommending our shop! We're very grateful for every opportunity we get to service your BMW and we are glad to hear you enjoy working with us. We're looking forward to seeing you next time. Until then, drive safely!

name: Taylor Molitoris
text: I had originally taken my BMW to another mechanic in Birmingham for basic engine work. My car sat there for over a week without any updates so I took it over to World Class auto and they were able to repair it and get it back to me in 24 hours. Car runs great and I appreciate the communication, customer service, and professionalism I received from them in contrast with the other mechanic.

resp.text: We're so glad you came to see us for a second opinion, Taylor! It was a pleasure servicing your BMW's engine, and we're very happy we could provide you with more efficient, enjoyable service. Please come see us again the next time your BMW needs maintenance or repair!

name: Ric Davis
text: Friendly staff.  Staff (owners wife) was willing to discuss my bmw and service questions (just basic car talk) without trying to sell me on anything. I felt like they were honest enough that I'd be comfortable getting my car serviced or repaired at their facility in the future.

resp.text: We're very happy to hear this, Ric! Thank you for trusting us with your BMW's service needs. We're thrilled to know you felt comfortable and confident with our service, and we look forward to working with you again in the future. Thank you for choosing World Class Auto Repair in Birmingham!

name: Cassandra Pullom
text: Mrs. Yvonne was courteous and accommodating with My time and care for my Mercedes and so was Her Staff.

resp.text: Thank you for allowing our team to care for your Mercedes, Cassandra! It was a pleasure working with you and we're very glad to know you enjoyed the customer care you received from Yvonne and our automotive professionals. Don't be a stranger! Please come see us again the next time your Mercedes is due for maintenance.

name: David Schmitt
text: My 2009 Mercedes Benz E350 was making a noise at the right rear and I thought it was the wheel bearing starting to go.  I knew it was an expensive job so I searched for a local MB repair shop and found WCAR.  They ended up diagnosing the problem as the rear differential.  The job was completed quickly, professionally and at a fair price.  I now have an ABS problem I need to repair and will be bringing the car back to get this done.  I would recommend this shop to anyone.  Excellent work done professionally!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review, David! It was a pleasure working with you and we're very grateful for the opportunity to service your Mercedes Benz. We really appreciate that you've shared what you enjoyed about working with World Class Auto Repair and we look forward to working with you again when you come back for your ABS repair. Don't hesitate to call if there's anything more we can assist you with. See you next time!

name: Wesley Barber
text: We had our vehicle dropped off.   They kept on top with us to let us know they tow truck driver hadn't dropped off the key.  After they go it, they took the time to research what the codes were and what solutions were available.  They kept me informed the entire time.  I highly recommend them car repairs.  I will use them again.

resp.text: Thank you for the recommendation, Wesley! Your support means a lot to us and we're very happy to know you enjoyed working with us as much as we enjoyed working with you. It was a pleasure assisting you with your vehicle's diagnosis and we appreciate the opportunity to help. We look forward to providing you with additional car care in the future! Thank you for choosing World Class Auto Repair and taking the time to review us.

name: black Jack
text: Great staff. Will refer to anyone. They will get all my business

resp.text: We're so honored to have earned your trust and referral! Thank you for choosing World Class Auto Repair and supporting us with your positive feedback.

name: Darrell Lindsey
text:
I have a 2012 Mercedes S550 and my Air Suspension Strut went out. I called World Class and had it towed in. They called me the next day, told me what was going on and gave me a quote. I promise you, they didn’t try to jack me up and tell me that other things were wrong, they just zeroed in on the problem and fixed it. I said that because I think all of us are looking for straight shooters who are not trying to get over on you... Now, because of high demand of car maintenance and everyone wanting their vehicle to be repaired, I had to wait a few days on my car; but it was explained to me upfront. And because of the excellent service and “Great Price,” it was worth the wait and I will be returning again for all of my future repairs!!! I highly recommend World Class because truly they are “World Class!!”
P.S. Brenden is a super nice guy with great customer service and has a “First Class Business!!!
Way to go World Class!!!!

resp.text: Thank you, Darrell! We're so glad to know you had a five-star experience here at World Class Auto Repair. Thank you for trusting us to care for your Mercedes! It was a pleasure working with you and we are thrilled to know you were satisfied with the quality of our repair, the level of customer service you received, and the pricing of our services. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and for recommending us to others! It means a lot and we are looking forward to your next visit!

name: Kayla
text: Very pleased with the work done and the professionalism. Highly recommended!

resp.text: Kayla, our team is pleased to hear that you are satisfied with the automotive services we provided. Thank you for the review and recommendation!

name: Mickey Purnell
text: Everyone I dealt with was knowledgeable, friendly and explained what services were performed and why.

resp.text: Transparency is very important to us, and we're always working to ensure our clients stay fully informed throughout their visit - whether it's for repair or maintenance. Thank you for choosing World Class Auto Repair and taking the time to review us, Mickey!

name: Carl Peoples
text: The team did a good job of finding the problem and fixing it.

resp.text: We're glad we could provide you with excellent service, Carl! Thank you for choosing World Class Auto Repair and taking the time to review us. If there's anything else we can assist you with, please don't hesitate to reach out!

name: Charles Kown
text: Excellent service and a better price than the MB dealership.

resp.text: Thank you for the positive feedback, Charles! We really appreciate your kind words and support. Please don't hesitate to give us a call the next time your Mercedes needs service!

name: Woodie Coleman
text: Excellent customer service, Mrs Yvonne is always very helpful and just a joy to talk to

resp.text: Your feedback means a lot to our team, Woodie. Thank you for your continued loyalty and support for World Class Auto Repair!

name: Mike Hamner
text: Great service, they pay attention to detail and they make recommendations that are very helpful.

resp.text: That's what we're here for! Thanks for the kind words, Mike. It was great seeing you and we look forward to working with you more in the future. Until then, take care!

name: Brent Bonham
text: Very knowledgeable and helpful.

resp.text: Thank you, Brent! We're very glad we could be of assistance to you, and even happier to know you felt confident in the knowledge and skills of our automotive professionals. Please come see us again soon!

name: Mark R Ritchie
text: They offer professional service at a reasonable prices. I highly recommend their services.

resp.text: Your recommendation is greatly appreciated, Mark! Thank you for choosing World Class Auto Repair and taking the time to support us with a positive review.

name: Jacqui Sweet
text: The friendliest people around that take care of your precious car.

resp.text: Thank you, Jacqui! It's a pleasure working with you and we appreciate the opportunity to take care of your vehicle. Thank you for choosing World Class Auto Repair and taking the time to share your feedback. It means a lot to us.

name: Shawn Dixson
text: I am from Louisville Ky. I was visiting Birmingham when my BMW X5 died on me. Had it towed to the dealership where it was diagnosed. Verdict from the BMW dealership was outrageous. Had vehicle towed to world class auto. Best move ever. The dealership had misdiagnosed my vehicle. World Class repaired my BMW for a fraction of what the dealership was trying to charge. Very honest business practices. Very friendly. Do great work. BMW is performing like new!!

resp.text: We're so glad to hear your X5 is performing so well, Shawn! Thank you for trusting our team here at World Class Auto Repair to care for your BMW while you were visiting the Birmingham area. We're so grateful you sought us out for a second opinion and we enjoyed working with you. Thank you for taking the time to review us! We hope to work with you again someday.

name: a murrell
text: Brandon was very knowledgeable, when I took my daughter BMW in to be serviced by them. I felt as though I got an honest price for work that was done on the car.#NewCustomer

resp.text: Thank you for choosing World Class Auto Repair! We're happy to hear you enjoyed your first visit to our shop, and we appreciate the opportunity to service your daughter's BMW. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and award us a positive rating! We hope to work with you more in the future.

name: Paul Crouse
text: Great service... !!

resp.text: That's exactly what we strive for! Thanks for letting us know we hit our mark, Paul! It was a pleasure working with you and we hope we get another opportunity to do so in the future. Thank you for choosing World Class Auto Repair of Birmingham!

name: Brandon Croom
text:
Nice Family. They do great work.
Make an appointment, it's better for everyone, but plan to leave the vehicle and pick it up by end of day 9/10. I recommend for any Mercedes Owner.

resp.text: And we really appreciate our customers.  We service Mercedes, BMW and Mini Cooper and have the dealer-level diagnostic tools to do so.

name: Michelle Ford
text: Yvonne not the friendliest person to work with public

resp.text: We're very sorry to hear you were less than satisfied with the service you received here at World Class Auto Repair, Michelle. If you're willing, please call us at (205) 591-7990 and we will do our best to find a positive resolution for you. Thank you for reaching out and providing us with your honest feedback.

name: Mike Hooton
text: Very professional service. Cost less than original estimate! Will use again and also recommend to others.

resp.text: Thank you for your recommendation, Mike! It means a lot to us and we're so glad we were able to provide quality work for less than anticipated. It's always a good feeling. Thank you for sharing your kind words with us! We look forward to working with you again.

name: Lester Smith
text: Just recently been introduce to World Class Auto Repair and my wife and I feel confident that they rendered top notched service 💯%🤙🏽

resp.text: Thank you for driving to Birmingham from Oxford, AL to get your BMW 530i serviced at our shop.  Hope you'll be back on the road with the new brakes, battery and oil service.  It's a pleasure to have wonderful customers like you.

name: Mary Nicholls
text: Very  friendly and helpful. Willing to discuss proposed repairs and costs! Car runs great after service completed.

resp.text: That means we did our job, this is our goal for each car and customer.  Thank you for choosing us to perform the scheduled transmission service on your Mercedes.

name: Marliese Thomas
text: I drive an older BMW and had to call four places before finding a shop that would work on a car that old. The people at World Class Auto Repair were friendly, helpful, and effective! The final repair was even less than the original estimate. I'm so glad to now know of a quality repair place that's also in my neighborhood.

resp.text: Thank you. We have been in business for 30 years, and our journeyman technicians have years of experience with older BMWs and Mercedes as well as the diagnostic tools and expertise for newer ones.

name: Patrick Dailey
text: I don't normally post reviews, but I feel compelled to pass along my excellent experience at World Class Auto. I had the front/back brakes replaced on my 2011 BMW 328i, and the work was quality, timely, and fairly priced. The staff was friendly, knowledgeable, and generally made the experience as enjoyable as possible. Additionally, the mechanic diagnosed and fixed my broken windshield washer pump without me evening mentioning the issue at first (compared to a certain service provider, who shall remain nameless, who wanted $300 to do it!). I'd give them 6 stars if I could.

resp.text: Wow!  We give customers like this 6 stars also.  We want to take care of our customers by taking care of their cars, and give them one less thing to be concerned with in life.  Thanks for your kind review Patrick.

name: Edward Payne
text: World Class auto repair is a Great alternative to the dealer . They gave me the Star treatment . I recommend them to everyone who want dealer service , but not dealer repair prices . Edward Payne .

resp.text: Thank you for 5 stars. We promise to continue to give you and all our customers the "star treatment "....you deserve it.  We're glad we could repair your Mercedes by replacing the ignition.

name: Don’t Worry
text: Owner quoted me at $700 then some lady quoted me $1100 at checkout. This has happened before because I read a review about this and then it happened to me. Red flags everywhere here. Went elsewhere

resp.text: We're very sorry to hear you were dissatisfied with our service, but are grateful you've brought it to our attention. We invite you to call the shop in order to speak with the owner directly. We'd be happy to address your concerns and frustrations, however I believe the confusion is that you called for an estimate and the fellow you spoke with gave you a price over the phone based on your assessment of the car, but when you brought it in, we gave you an accurate estimate of what your vehicle needed, including both parts and labor.  When you have time, please call (205) 591-7990. We hope to hear from you soon so we may work to resolve the issue. Thank you!

name: Joseph Beavers
text: Best experience I've ever had getting my car repaired. Staff is awesome and professional.

resp.text: That says a lot....THANK YOU!

name: Jim McCollum
text:
What else is there to say when they are the best. 😁😁
They deserve beyond the 5 Star Review.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words regarding the work we did on your Mercedes.

name: Carlyle Galloway
text: Brought my 1994 BMW 325is in for a driveshaft and mount issue, and they had my bimmer fixed right up. Quick turnaround and reasonable pricing. Will probably use these guys again if I need more servicing done on my car

resp.text: Glad we could help with your BMW.

name: David Goodwin
text:
An amazing job with an older Mercedes 300CD!  It has essentially sat for a number years and the service and repair schedule needed to begin again.  They kept in constant contact as they uncovered areas that needed to be addressed with a full explanation and estimate of the work needed.
It was a great experience and and I'm very comfortable in recommending World Class Auto Repair.

resp.text: Good customers are like good cars...hard to find...and we both lucked up.  Thanks for the great review.

name: Jim Wilson
text: Excellent customer service always, great cost-savings, A+++ work!!!

resp.text: Thanks for bringing in your Mercedes for Service and Battery.  It's always a pleasure to see you or Chris and we really appreciate you both.

name: John Markus
text: I have used World Class for several years and have been quite satisfied with the quality of the work and value received.  I trust them not to recommend more than I need and to perform any necessary repairs right the first time.  Also, the offer of a ride downtown and back makes the process very convenient.

name: Dwayne Carmichael
text: Do not take your vehicle to this place. I brought my BMW X5 there to have the water pump replaced. They replaced the water pump, but damaged other parts on my vehicle while doing the repair. I was quoted $360 labor to replace the water pump. I called to check on my vehicle later that evening, and Yvonne said that her technician was having a hard time installing the water pump and that they had to charge me an extra hour worth of labor. Who fault is that? I told them no way, so they only charged me the $360 that I was originally quoted. However they did mentioned that my car needed 2 more repairs and quoted me $563 for one and $440 for the other. The $440 repair was for a hose that was damaged while they were changing the pump. The hose cost $40 from the BMW dealership and they said it would be 4 hours of labor, which didn't sound right for a hose. I called 3 other independent shops and was quoted $130 for the same repair parts and labor. The $563 was for a hood latch and cable, the parts at dealer are $80. Yvonne also said it would be 4 hours labor. I called several independent shops and was quoted $200 for parts and labor. I guess 4 is there magic number. When I asked Yvonne to double check those quotes all of a sudden she wasn't able to find the labor rates in the system. How did she come up with those figures initially? Bottom line do not take your car to these ppl. Yvonne charges you whatever she feels like and that's not right.

resp.text: We remember you well.  You brought your car late one afternoon with a coolant leak,  and we drove you across town to take you home. You didn't mention that your hood latch was locked and would not open. We spent quite a while to opened the hood to replace the water pump that you brought for us to install, and you declined the hood repair knowing that it would not reopen once it was shut.  We actually charged less labor to install the water pump than the labor guide prescribes.  We also told you about another coolant leak that you say we caused, but we did not; you also declined that repair.  Yes, we would normally charge more because of the extra work to open your hood because of the latch and cable.  Your car came in with several problems, but none caused by us.  We did our best to accommodate you in every way and we're sorry you left dissatisfied.

name: Rico Suave
text: Dropped my car off for a radiator change. It took about a week to just get an estimate when I was told it would be looked at the following morning. When I finally got the estimate, it was on the high end, quoted a few more hours than normal. Continuously called to try to get information over the next week! Was lied to several times throughout the two weeks and one day for a radiator change! Wasn't even notified when they required another part.  On top of it, the manager/owner referred to me as a "damn Yankee". Great business savvy you moron. If you want over priced work, dishonesty, ignorant management this is the place for you. Honestly, the worst experience I've ever had at a car maintenance facility.

resp.text: Sorry, Mr. Suave, but we have no record of you ever being in our shop.  We take our reviews very seriously, but you must have us confused with another shop.

name: Max Wood
text: I've used other Mercedes non-dealer providers for years.  This is one of the best!

resp.text: We appreciate you taking time to give us such a great review.  We're happy to assist with any problems and/or service needed on your Mercedes.

name: Tiffany Whitmore
text:
The staff at World Class Auto make me feel welcome, comfortable and always take the time to explain why my car needs a certain repair, what options I have and the timeframe of repair urgency. The repair and ownership team take the time to get to know you and always listen to what I think is going on with my car. Hands down I wouldn't take my car any other place in the Birmingham area for regular maintenance to more complex projects.

Most of the service I have received is on a 2005 BMW x3. They are helping me keep it rolling in good shape.

name: E P
text: World Class was a great experience in working with an older mercedes diesel that I plan to drive forever and they are the ones to keep it going.

resp.text: We were happy to replace the ball joints & engine mounts & shocks on your 2005 Mercedes E320 CDI.  We're glad your experience was a pleasure, and that you trust us to take care of your car.

name: Window Decor
text: Phillip and Yvonne really care about us from a financial point of view which is quite refreshing. Our past experience with our local Mercedes dealer left us searching for another source to fix our cars(we own 2 Mercedes) and we were given them by past customer. It has been a great relationship.

name: Jeffrey Solomon
text: Fair, knowledgeable and prompt. In addition to the quality work, WCA conveys a tremendous sense of honesty.

resp.text: We always appreciate kind words & great customers like Mr. Solomon. This makes our job a pleasure.

name: David Averyt
text: The team at World Class always takes care of me!

resp.text: Thanks David, thank you for letting us service and replace the timing chain on your Mini-Cooper.

name: Kara Snell
text: Great work and efficient!

resp.text: Thank you, Kara! It was a pleasure working with you and we're glad we were able to service your vehicle in a convenient time frame. Thank you for choosing World Class Auto Repair!

name: mikaelgriffin
text: The Best..fair pricing and honest evaluation...I would not take my 2005 Crossfire anywhere else. They have my business from now till forever....Michael Griffin

name: Carl Tamm
text: If you like to be treated like a person, and not like a number, this is the place!  Great professional service, from friendly and trustworthy people.

name: Matthew Ponder
text: Very professional, very courteous and friendly. Will totally be using them for my MB upkeep!

resp.text: Thanks, we'll take care of your Mercedes maintenance and repairs.

name: John Bagwell
text: The only place in town that can make a 1966 MG-B run as smooth as a baby's ass...

name: Blake Howard
text: Best shop in B'ham if your European or Asian luxury vehicle has any mechanical troubles, and the friendly and helpful staff will get back on the road.

resp.text: Thank you--your BMW will be in good hands with us.

name: t
text: Great service - they have the equipment and people to do the job right,

name: Blake Howard
text: Specialized and Certified to work on MBZ, BMW, Lotus, Ferrari,and various other euro/Asian luxury imports.

name: Allen Kilgore
text: Outstanding people and outstanding customer service.  What more can you ask for?

name: James Ovario
text: I dropped my car off on a Tuesday morning and these guys had it fixed by 5 pm the same day. They are friendly and honest.

name: Ethan
text: World Class Auto always does an excellent job.

resp.text: Our pleasure--we always appreciate nice customers and want to do the best job possible.

name: DeMarcus Blanding
text: Awesome customer service

resp.text: Thank you.  We're happy we could diagnose, replace and program the control module your Mercedes C Class needed.  Five stars is quite a goal to reach--we'll always work toward maintaining that goal.

name: Busy Blake
text: Poor customer service!! I only gave them one star because it is required to leave a comment, but they don't deserve that star either.

name: Matt G
text: These folks really know their stuff! I have used this garage for over 15 years and they have never steered me wrong.

name: Deborah Hall
text: Awesome Folks!!!

resp.text: Always nice to see you.  Thanks.

name: Melanie Harris
text: Had a blast!

name: AVA MILLER
text: they are awesome

name: Lawrence Carmon
text: Very professional.

name: Jerry Campbell
text:
EarIier this year I had a 1987 S10 with a 350ci worked on for worked on for 30+ minutes  and was charged zero.  Dennis Morgan the service manager said the mechanic was unable to  improve it but also stated what needed to be done and if I needed them to let them know.  Thanks Dennis Morgan..

In August I returned with the same auto after someone else worked on it. They did the fine tuning for $25.50.  I should have used them for the complete repair instead of wasting alot of money and time? A very costly mistake on my part.

Thanks Dennis Morgan (Manger) and Jesse Simmons (Mechanic)

I would use them again and highly recommend them to anyone who wants to be treated fairly and needed help at a very fair price! They let you make the decisions and apply no pressure to get yor business! Its very hard to find a business like that today!

resp.text: Thanks for the high recommendation, Jerry. Happy we were able to help. Don't hesitate to reach out anytime you need our assistance again. All the best. - David Below

name: Greg Howard
text: I had a car emergency and limped in to their shop early Monday morning. Greg was already there and welcomed me in even though they were not open yet. Greg and the entire staff were friendly and professional. The facility was incredibly clean, both the shop and showroom. I do not hesitate recommending them.

resp.text: I'm so glad we were able to help you out with your car, Greg. My team does their best to make sure our customers are well taken care of and that our work stays fast and exceptional. Thanks for the awesome rating, and if you ever need anything else we're here for you! -David Below

name: Andi Dover
text: He ruined my vehicle!!!! Service manager made me feel 1 inch tall! But he does have a cute nice helpful wrecker driver named Earl!! I wish he was not taken.

resp.text: Andrea, thanks for the review. We're sorry to hear you weren't too pleased though. We will look into this. -David Below

name: Gene Simmons
text: I was taking a trip from Florida to Kentucky and below car clinic treated me and my mother like family even though we had never met. I needed a helicoil done when my spark plug blew out of the head and Wesley took care of it on his lunch break so we would be on our way. They even went and got us lunch while we waited. The world needs more amazing honest people like them. Best experience I've ever had with any auto repair shop. 5 stars all day long

resp.text: Gene, we're so glad you were pleased with the service we provided to you while you were on your trip. It's never good to have an issue -- especially when you're away from home. We hope you're doing well! -David Below

name: Kevin Turan
text: Very helpful, great prices, and they don't try to pressure you by keeping you there all day and wearing you down. I'd recommend Below Car Clinic to anyone looking for a vehicle or needing work done on one.  If you are tired of be mistreated try this place.

resp.text: Kevin, thanks for the great review! We're so glad you were pleased with our prices and service, too. Come back again soon! -David Below

name: John Phillips
text: I recommend Below Car Clinic to anyone who needs automotive work done. They know what they're doing and they will always stand behind their work. Below Car Clinic is no longer open for business.

resp.text: John, thanks for choosing us! We're so glad you had a great experience with us and found us easy to work with. We hope you choose us again in the future! -Thank you, David Below

name: Jimmy Akers
text: Fantastic service and helpful staff.I would advise  any one needing mechanical help to go here first.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Akers. We hope to see you back here again!

name: Misty Goodlett
text: Very honest and informative. Will never go anywhere else again.

resp.text: We appreciate the stars! Honest and informative is the only way to do it. Don't hesitate to reach out anytime you need our services. - David Below

name: David Nelson
text: Great quality service!

resp.text: David, you're the best. Thanks for your review. We're here for you anytime you want another hand. -David Below

name: Misty Michelle Robinson
text: Nice people, good service

resp.text: Thanks for the high rating, Misty. We appreciate the support. If we can ever lend a hand again, let us know. -David Below

name: Tracey Bailey
text: Nice people to work with

resp.text: We’re happy we could help out, Tracey. Thank you for your support. Don't hesitate to reach out if you ever need anything. -David Below

name: Misdom Kritner
text: Good work

name: Richard Lynch
text: Not in business anymore

name: Alyssa Oliver
text:
Called up there to schedule a drop off. Because they had good reviews. Not the friendliest person who answered the phone. That's fine but when I told him what was going on he said we dont do transmission work. My problem is it says they do on their website. Rude and waste of time. Going to add to the post I was discriminated against I guess because I'm a woman. my husband called the place and said exactly what I said the problem
Was and they told him yes they do that there.

resp.text: Hello Mrs. Oliver. We do not rebuild transmissions, but we do remove and replace transmissions with either used transmissions or remanufactured transmissions. A gentleman called yesterday and obtained a price to replace the torque convertor. I am not sure if this was your husband or not, but we can replace a torque convertor because it is physically attached to the transmission and is not an internal part. I believe there may have been some miscommunication as to what was required to repair the vehicle/transmission. Alabaster Automotive, LLC prides itself in servicing EVERYONE in the community and we do not discriminate against anyone based on sex, ethnicity, religion, etc. If you would like to discuss this matter further, please feel free to reach out to me with a phone call. Thank you.

name: Jeremy “Lucky” Jamison
text: They get on the ball with fixing your vehicle no matter what the problem is and faster than most anywhere around believe it or not. But if you choose to sit and wait they dont seem to mind if you charge your phone while you wait! I will recommend everyone that I know to get their vehicle fixed HERE! Plue they are on point and polite.

resp.text: Thank you for the review Jeremy. Hope everything is going well!

name: jenny mcneal
text: Being a women. I am always nervous about taking our car anywhere to have anything fixed . But , I am so thankful I found Alabaster Automotive Llc. I feel so much better there are  very friendly and professional. They made me feel like we had  know them  forever they called and kept me updated while they had my car and  went above and beyond to help me . They where very fast . This will always be my go to place .  Thanks for Everything guys Jenny Mcneal

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Mrs. McNeal! I am glad you had a great experience with us. Thanks for bringing your vehicle by and trusting us with it.

name: Elizabeth Johnson
text: Honest, work done in an acceptable amount of time, and professional. I’ll definitely tell anyone I know to take their vehicle to this place.

resp.text: Thank you for letting everyone know about the great experience you had with us. We appreciate it! Thank you for the review.

name: Daniel Cavinder
text: Nice guys. Good timely service. Would recommend.

resp.text: Thank you for your review! I am glad we were able to help you.

name: Ben Aaron
text: Great service! They have always done my work in a timely manor. Highly recommend

name: Daniel Mulkey
text: These guys are awesome! I’d highly recommend. Proficient technicians and outstanding service people. Thank you.

name: Cumberland Computer Services
text: New Ownership and New Management.  All new people. They have done a great job for us, very sincere and trustworthy to give them a chance!  Try them out.

name: Kayla Johnson
text: John is great! My dad recommended these folks yo me and they are great! I won't be going to anyone else when I need work done. They're honest and do great work.

name: Kenneth Sanchez
text: Charges out the a** for a diagnostic and didn’t even find what was wrong with my vehicle. Imagine.

resp.text: Mr. Sanchez, sorry to hear that you are not happy. Checking our records, we found the issue that you were having with your car after the diagnostic we performed.  I personally showed you that your wiring harness had been severed by the oversize wheels that where put on your car. Please feel free to reach out with any questions you may have. Thank you.

name: CallMehMaddy
text: I will never take my truck anywhere else from now on!  I took my truck to them a couple of weeks ago and they were honest/fair priced and fixed it within a few hours!  Wayne and John were amazing, as were the rest of the techs.  They were a blessing in my life that I so much needed and they made me laugh!  I am recommending them to all of my friends no matter where they live in Alabama. Thank you for the little blessings Alabaster Auto!

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing about your experience, Lisa! We're glad you like our awesome staff as much as we do, and that you were happy with our pricing and speed! We really appreciate the recommendation and we look forward to seeing you next time!

name: Nancy McCay
text:
Fantastic service !
Honest and fast.

name: Andrae Antwoine
text: They explain, very professional, but not accountable for any mistakes.  I have 4 kids and wife, the expense was necessary..they had to replace spark plugs, explained that if removed, Its a possibility some will break off...well 1 got stuck in the engine.....it requires taking everything out and restructure how it was before...with no mistakes...so it took 2-3 weeks to get it done...after 3100$ mechanic informed us #1 he drove the car 65 miles testing the truck..no gas reimbursement (not considering our financial needs)....#2.that our sensor light was not working, (but we never had an issue with it),they didn't charge us for replacing it, but now it  ironically reads an alternator light.  #3 The mechanic simply said, i don't know why it came on, but it needs to be replaced. Although, your safe to drive it home.   #4. 2 weeks later, a great amount of smoke begins to shoot out exhaust...that very day, I took it to another auto place to get it assessed. (my red flags were to much).The other repair shop did not go into detail, but towed it back to alabaster, free of charge told them the issue and Alabaster Auto's  said "we'll give them a call".  #5 2 days later, I called them...ask "what is the problem?" they replied: The fluid injectors ironically messed up within 2 weeks, causing oil to spill onto the motor, "washing it out"...not only did they tell me an alternator was needed, but now I have to buy a new motor. Their excuse was....this is all a coincidences. they don't know why these thing are happening to my ford expedition that is under 120,000 miles. I called the other auto store to come and get it...I'll pay them what is necessary, but I am not spending another dime at alabaster Auto's.  We are taking legal action against them immediately after proof of fault. I can't except "it's all a coincidence".

resp.text: Andrae, one of our goals is to be honest and forthright with our customers. Also, we make every effort to ensure our customers are satisfied.  We deeply regret not being able to do so in your situation.

name: Tim Brewer (jugglertim)
text: Older shop, but they have always been good to me. Very reasonable prices and honest people.

name: Mighty Mouse
text: I really like Alabaster Auto. They always do good work and have great prices! Mr. Ricky is a very friendly guy. I think they really care about their customers and have been in Alabaster since I moved here when I was about 8 yrs old, 30+ years later and they are still packed with business every day. That should speak volumes in of itself.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to write this nice review! We're glad you like our work, prices, and that you can see how much Ricky and the team care about our customers like you. Thanks again and see you next time!

name: Ramarao CS
text: Ricky and Wayne have been there for God knows how long!! Excellent and reasonable service. Like it that they take NO reservations. Strictly first come first served!! Ricky once apologized to me that a replacement tire to my Lexus was expensive!!!! Go figure.

resp.text: We're so glad you like Ricky and Wayne's service and our reservation-free business model! We're glad we have been able to take care of you and your vehicles over the years and thank you for writing this review!

name: Heather Edmondson
text: Great place!

name: Perin Hankins
text: Fast, friendly service. Great prices. Just needed a new tire this visit but will definitely be back for future needs.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Perin. We look forward to seeing you back!

name: Jimmy Chambliss
text: Great tire store. Very helpful staff

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to recognize our helpful staff, Jimmy! We appreciate it!

name: Katrina Hinkle
text: Amazing guys! They always have gone above and beyond to help with all of my car needs. They do not nickel and dime you to death. They will forever have my business and I recommend them to any and everyone who needs service.

name: Corey Burns
text: The entire team was willing to help me loosen up my lug nuts.  They did it put of their personal time and didn't even charge me. They are an Awesome Team!

resp.text: Thank you, Corey, for the kind review!

name: Ben Hutsler
text: Been using these guys for the 2 years I lived in Alabaster.  Mechanics John and Randall are great, they will talk to you, make suggestions and both tell and show you what they are doing.  Only issue was when I took my vehicle to them right before Christmas and it was 3 days to even look at the car.  I didn't have the time so I took it to another Alabaster repair shop..................................MAJOR MISTAKE!!!  Keep up the great work Wayne and Ricky and all involved at Alabaster Auto! Thanks. Ben

resp.text: You're welcome, Ben. Thank you for your review and continued business with us!

name: Dayon Lane
text:
Do NOT aide this place. My CRV had to go in to have the fan assembly replaced. Upon getting it back I saw that my A/C no longer blew cold and my automatic window function no longer worked. Then, when taking it in to be looked at, I found that they BROKE what holds to coolant reservoir and just had it sitting, and it was empty. They had lost two of the caps on the front, AND they didn’t attach the grill back correctly.

I called them and they said to bring it in Saturday. I head that way and call them to tell them I’m on the way. And they inform me not to come Bc they are not able to do it Saturday and to come Monday. Isn’t an option for me. I paid $532 for them to essentially break my car. WILL never go back.

name: Andrew Hicks
text: GREAT staff! Very friendly and professional. The level of service on my car was too notch. We won't go anywhere else again.

resp.text: Thank you for all of the great feedback, Andrew!

name: Mark Wright
text: Had alternator and pulley replaced in June this year here.  Recently car wasnt  starting had to jump off took car to 2 places to check battery and alternator checked (free)was told it was alternator so took in here and they checked said it was the battery which I have no problem with but when I got there it was 42 dollar. Guess I should have asked first just assumed the shop that did the work would have done it free too.  Lesson learned I guess.

name: CEE WEST
text:
We recently had one of our cars worked on here and the service was fantastic.  My son and his family have their cars worked on here as well.
If you need a good honest repair service this is the place.

resp.text: Thank you for the great feedback on your experience. Happy we could help!

name: Lori Burnham
text: Can't even change brakes and rotors correctly. I brought it in several times after they changed them with a noise and they couldn't find it and blamed it on something else. Finally got tired of it and took it to another mechanic and they left bolts out of my caliper and I've had 2 brakes lock up since they did the work.

name: James Dean of Asbury
text: Best Shop Around to Have Work Done on Your Vehicle.  Outstanding Owners who care about your ride.

resp.text: Thank you, James, for such a great review. We appreciate your kind feedback!

name: Jill Messer
text: We stopped here on our way to Gulf Shores, after having some minor issues with our breaks which turned out to be nothing other than the adjusting of the new pads I has installed a few days before. They were Saturday but got us in quickly within a few mins. The mechanic and the older gentleman in the office were very friendly and courteous. The gentleman sent us on our way to enjoy our vacation and didn't charge us. If you're having car trouble in this area this is your place. They are Great folks!

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback! Our main concern has always been the safety and satisfaction of our customers. We’re glad to hear we have delivered that. Thanks again, Justin!

name: Nikaveli ThaWhitePantha
text: The store manager Ricky Tidmore lied to my family and took over $12,000 dollars all the while blaming me on how the car was driven. Sold us a transmission when the motor and transmission needed to be replaced. DO NOT TRUST THIS PLACE. GO SOMEWHERE ELSE!!!

name: Warren D. Sweeney
text: My last review wasn't what I intended. I just figured how to change it. They really do have a five star rating with me.

resp.text: If there is anything we can do to earn the 5th star warren please let us know.

name: kevin armstrong
text: I came here to have a plug put in my trailer tire. I waited and was told to back my truck around. When i started backing in someone else whips in and i was forced to stop. He comes up to my window and tells me to wait just a minute and let him take care of this customer. I waited another 10-15 minutes. He finally plugs my tire, i pay and leave. I drive 1/2 Mile home. Get up the next morning and the tire is low again. I drive back down there and tell them something was wrong. There was one person in the lobby and he tells me the wait would be at least one hour to put air in my tire. I had to unload several things from my trailer to get to tools needed for me to put air in it myself. I did this in there parking lot as they say inside and watched me. They won't make there wrongs right. Expert tire is right across the street.

resp.text: Kevin, when we reached out it sounded like you had no issues with your experiences at our shop after we offered to assist in any way we could. If there are any further concerns, please reach out to us as we would like to clear up any misunderstandings. Thank you.

name: Chase Miller
text:
First time customer, came in off recommendation from a friend.

Staff friendly, clean waiting room, good location, fair advertised prices.

3 stars due to being told over phone an oil change would be 20-30 mins wait, showed up 20 mins after the call and I sat in the waiting area over 1-1/2 hrs (I waited because I understand business, and things do happen) without anyone informing me of any delays. I left without recieving any service.

Don't set expectations and then not fulfill them without an explanation, before money walks out the door.

resp.text: Chase, we appreciate you taking the time to leave us a review and for the feedback on your visit. We apologize if any part of your experience was less than satisfactory and we hope to have the opportunity in the future to work with you. If there is anything else that we are able to help with please feel free to give us a call.

name: Adam West
text: We've used this place a handful of times and it seems reasonably priced and they get the work done in a timely manner. We had some major electrical work that needed to be done, car wouldn't start and show any signs of life from a brand new battery, they repaired it and was ready to go in under 2 days

resp.text: Thanks so much for your review and your business.  We look forward to helping you in the future.

name: bigdogtrading
text: They do all my auto work on all 4 trucks and I also buy my tires from them and have never had any problems.  I would highly recommend them to anyone need a competitive price on tires or any other auto service.

name: Luis Valencia
text: Had great service every time I've been here, from a simple oil change to engine work. My new spot to bring my autos here because they've gained my trust, highly recommend.

resp.text: We’re always happy to help out Luis! Thanks for the review and for your business.

name: John Galliera
text: Been there a long time.

name: LaNell Crocker
text: They're awesome.   Wouldn't go anywhere else!

resp.text: Thank you for the wonderful feedback LaNell! We are so glad to hear we are your go to shop for all your car needs!

name: Lynette Kasper
text: Grateful fold here.

name: BILL SMOKE
text: Only people that work on my cars. Super nice make you feel like part of family.

name: Tim Bruner
text: It was great,love going there to get anything done!

resp.text: Tim, we're glad that you enjoying coming to our shop! Thanks for the five-star rating!

name: Alexander Rankin
text: Great place to have your car worked on. Quick and friendly services.

name: Gracious Washington
text: Great service, very friendly staff. Will use again.

resp.text: Thank you for the compliments, Gracious!

name: Ben Turner
text:
Been using these guys for about a year since moving to Alabaster. Their hourly rate is the cheapest I have found anywhere and they always take care of my problems on both my cars. Oil changes are only about $22 and that includes a tire rotation and they don't try to upsell you on a bunch of crap you don't need like alot of other places in the area who offer cheap oil changes and then make it up with additional "needs fixing items".

The mechanics and the 2 gentlemen at the front desk are always helpful, and courteous even though they are always busy and I can't thank them enough.

I don't believe for a second these 2 reviews that say they did such a poor job and accept that some people are never happy unless they can drag everyone else into the misery pit where they reside.

Thanks Alabaster Auto and I will continue to use you and recommend you to my friends as long as I am in this area.

Ben

resp.text: Ben, thank you so much for the comments you left concerning our service! We appreciate your business and will continue to strive to meet your expectations! See you next time!

name: Jason King
text: Super group of guys that'll take care of your automobile.

resp.text: Thanks for the feedback, Jason. Always happy to help!

name: wayne lay
text:
Rick really takes good care of me and my wife and our automotive needs
He's the reason we take our automotive repair business there

name: Neal Champion
text: Fair pricing, honest service, they handle all service on my vehicles.

resp.text: Thanks for your review Neal! We were happy to help out and look forward to helping you again any time you need us!

name: Eric Durrett
text: Great work for the right price. They will take care of you

name: H Leigh
text: Been taking my truck here for years.

name: Lana Davis
text: Inexpensive and very friendly

name: Janice Childs
text: Great prices

resp.text: We're glad you like our prices, Janice! Thank you for writing a review!

name: John Randall
text: They are running a special oil change tires rotated And up to 5 quarts of oil for 22.22.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We appreciate your business.

name: Glass man Glassman
text: Good service & personnel

resp.text: Thank you for the rating and feedback, we appreciate it!

name: Chris Hatch
text: Ricky and Wayne are awesome!

resp.text: Thank you, Chris, we're glad to know they both were able to help!

name: Jonathan Collins
text: Best shop

resp.text: Thanks for the review and for your business.

name: michael crowley
text: Rip offs shoddy work

name: Angie purvis
text: TRUSTFUL, HELPFUL & FRIENDLY

resp.text: We appreciate you taking time to give us a review.  Thank you so much for your business!

name: Chris Sharp
text: Good service

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words, Chris. We appreciate you and your business. Please let us know if there is anything else we can do for you!

name: rafa abastta
text: Excellent customer service... We asked for diagrams and got them within the hour... we were able to order that day.... for Overnight.  Chris Ward was Super Fast and very helpful. He helped us get what we needed.

name: Destiny Fitch
text: Love it :)

name: BK Sensei
text: Went there March 16, 2021 just a few hours before the tornado that hit the area close by. These guys went above and beyond that day. That took care of my vehicle and the others in the shop even close to the time of the tornado passing. They made sure everyone there was safe and took us to the safest center room they had. I have a strong and hardy work ethic and even I wouldn't have asked these guys to work in the garage at the time they did. I have nothing but good regards for each and every person working there that day. I can't complement them enough. Definitely deserved a sixth star that day. Make sure you keep this place in mind when you need something taken care of.

resp.text: Thank you for your review! We are so grateful for your kind words and for your support. Thank you for choosing us!

name: Kevin Jones
text:
Greystone Tire and Automotive recently performed my son's 120k Service for a 2014 Camry SE. The car performs better than it did when we purchased the car with 70k miles on the odometer. The car "now" idles quietly which is uncommon for most four cylinder engines in my opinion.
The car drives like it's new. The difference after the 100k service and tune-up is appreciable.

resp.text: Kevin, thank you for your review! We were glad to help your son out with his 120k service on his 2014 Camry SE. We look forward to seeing you family next time!

name: Chad Cullum
text: Always a great experience, especially when dealing with Brooks. I've had five cars in there over the past two years, and I've never been disappointed with the service.

resp.text: Chad, thank you for your review! We're glad to help you out with your automotive repair needs and we'll see you next time!

name: Sheri Davis
text: Great place -- reasonable prices good staff

resp.text: Sheri, thank you for your review! We're glad to provide quality auto repair service while being friendly and reasonable. See you next time!

name: Ashley Smith
text: I was over on 280 for a massage when I noticed my van picked up a nail on the right passenger side. Thankful for these guys who took me right away to patch my tire so I could drive back over to my side of town in Trussville. If it wasn’t for them I probably would be stranded on the side of the road desperately seeking away to pick up my three small kids.  Thank you for being so kind, fast, and for having much compassion!

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review, Ashley! We take pride in providing automotive solutions for our customers in an efficient and friendly manner and we're glad we could help with your van's tire. We appreciate your kind words and we hope to see you back for future auto services!

name: AMBER TOLBERT
text: I had an incredible experience here with way better pricing than I have had on previous work on my car. Great service. Quick. Great price. Locally owned. You really can’t beat it!

resp.text: Thank you for the fantastic review, Amber! We're glad that you had a great experience at our shop and that we were able to provide quality auto services at fair prices. We appreciate your kind words and hope to see you back for future auto services!

name: KATHY RILEY
text: Slight issue with the first battery they put in, but it was a FAST easy swap. As a working mom...nothing beats how speedy and friendly these folks are!

resp.text: Kathy, thank you for leaving us a review and for continuing to trust us with your automotive repair and maintenance needs. We are glad to have you as a customer!

name: Phil Duke
text: Brooks ordered and installed new tires same day I called to ask.  Did the work in less time than he had estimated.  Very satisfied

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review, Phil! We take pride in providing quality and efficient auto services and we're glad we could order and install new tires for your vehicle. We appreciate your kind words and hope to see you back!

name: Sam Ferlisi
text: Diagnosed the issue, got the parts and made the repairs same day.  Radiator had to be replaced so the quick turn around was very beneficial.

resp.text: Sam, thank you for your review. We're glad we could diagnose your issue and got the repairs done in a timely manner. We will see you back in our auto repair shop soon!

name: Alex Larry
text: I’ve been coming here for years. Best prices. Best people to work with will take good care of you. Super fast. Trustworthy. Would highly recommend coming here first for any car needs

resp.text: We're so grateful for your support as well as your loyalty over the years to our shop in Birmingham, Alex! We look forward to seeing you again!

name: Kimberley Phillips
text: The power steering went out on my car.  They ordered a hose and it came in later than expected; however, these guys went above and beyond to have my car ready when they promised.  When and if I ever need work done on my car, these guys are the ones I'm using.

resp.text: Thank you for the five-star review, Kimberley! We're glad that we were able to take care of your vehicle's power steering and earn your trust in our shop. We appreciate your kind words and we're looking forward to having you back!

text: Excellent service.

resp.text: Thank you for your review and for supporting our auto repair shop!

name: Pierce Brunner
text: Needed new tires on a tight schedule. They had it turned around in less then a day. They have a great a staff and great prices.

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review, Pierce! We're glad that we could help you out with a new set of tires at great prices. We appreciate your kind words and we hope to see you back for future auto services!

name: Judy Berneske
text: Good work and good price. Just not crazy about sitting in your waiting room so long - without any magazines geared for women. :-)

resp.text: Thank you for the great review, Judy! We're glad that we were able to deliver quality auto services at fair prices. We appreciate your feedback and will work on getting new magazines. Let us know if there's any other auto services that we can do for you!

name: Jared King
text: Had a great experience with the staff. Called in AM and they told me to come by around 2pm for an alignment. They were able to have my taken care of in about 25 minutes. One of two shops in town that I would go to if I had any mechanical issues.

resp.text: Thanks, Jared! Your experience means everything to us. We're glad you chose us to do your alignment and we appreciate your loyalty! We look forward to seeing you again in the future!

name: Cathy McNeil
text: Very efficient as well as professional. Staff that knew what they were doing without taking advantage of you. Great place!!

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review, Cathy! We take pride in our staff and their ability to take care of customers and vehicles. We appreciate the five-star rating and we hope to see you back for future auto services!

name: Kristeena Thomas
text: We started using them for our company vehicles' routine maintenance. Easy to deal with, reasonable prices, and they actually do company accounts that way we don't have to call them with a company card every time we need service. HIGHLY recommend using them!

resp.text: Thanks, Kristeena! We appreciate your business and are always happy to service your company's vehicles. We appreciate the kind words! See you next time!

name: Kyle Bandy
text: Really great experience here! Brooks was very professional and the work done was very timely! Will be a returning customer

resp.text: Thank you for the amazing review, Kyle! We're glad that you had a great experience at our shop due to our awesome team and their efficient auto work. We appreciate you taking the time to leave us a review and we're looking forward to seeing you back for future auto services!

name: Dennis Wilson
text: Good service, competitively priced, friendly staff. I have been using Greystone Tire & Auto for several years and have always had a good experience.

resp.text: Thank you for the amazing review, Dennis! We're glad that we've been able to deliver consistent auto services at fair prices. We appreciate your continued support and we're looking forward to seeing you back!

name: Gabe Goodson
text: Great turn around time on the work I had done to my automobile, very professional and customer service is second to none. I will be using Greystone Tire & Auto from here on out.

resp.text: Thank you for the five-star review, Gabe! We take pride in our professional auto repairs and friendly customer service and we're glad that we could earn your trust. We appreciate your kind words and we're looking forward to having you back for future services on your vehicle!

name: Doug Phillips
text: Great family owned business always do a great job on my cars !

resp.text: We appreciate your kind words, Doug! We're glad that we've been able to provide consistent auto services for your vehicles and that we've been able to earn your trust. Thank you for reviewing us and we're looking forward to having you back!

name: Jeff Jarrett
text: I was in today for my first time and had a great experience.  Quick, and very professional.  Thanks guys!

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback, Jeff! Your experience at our shop means everything to us. Thanks for the 5-stars!

name: Mike Scaff
text: Awesome place , clean , excellent service . friends of ours , highly recommend .

resp.text: Thank you for the fantastic review, Mike! We're glad that you had an excellent experience at our shop and we appreciate your recommendation. We're looking forward to having you back for future auto services!

name: Michelle Mauro
text: Great experience!!! Pulled up as they were closing, after a rough day, and they still plugged my tire which was well on its way to going flat! Thanks!

resp.text: Michelle, we appreciate you choosing us for your tire needs and we're glad we were able to help you despite the circumstances! Thank you for the great review and we appreciate your business!

name: Jill Wegener
text: Awesome experience. Will go back. They accept Carmax extended warranty too!

resp.text: Thank you for the 5-star rating, Jill! We're grateful for your support of Greystone Tire & Auto and we look forward to helping you out again in the future!

name: John Lee
text: Great service, as always, from Greystone Tire & Auto.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, John! We're happy to help you out with your automotive repair needs and we'll see you next time!

name: Julie Mosby
text: Had a low pressure light come on.   Called them and they told me to come on over.   They checked the tire and found a nail, plugged it and I was on my way !!   Very professional and all done in about 15 minutes !!   Highly recommended !!

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave us an awesome rating and review, Julie! We understand that unexpected car troubles typically happen at really inconvenient times, which is why we strive for speed as well as efficiency. See you next time!

name: William Philpott
text: Great people, great service!  Thanks for helping our four car family keep rolling!

resp.text: Thank you for the five-star review, William! We're glad that we could help your family with their vehicles and we appreciate your continued support! Let us know if we can assist with any other auto services!

name: Billy Brown
text: Great service. Helpful, quick and fair. Will definitely continue taking my vehicles to them.

resp.text: We really appreciate your feedback and are always happy to help our customers with whatever they need! See you next time, Billy!

name: Westley Said
text: What I found most surprising was everyone hospitality. Great people and did not try to sell me something I did not need. They are fast and accurate at what they do and this is now my go to place. Definitely a thumbs up from me!

name: damonNzelda Patrick
text: They are very professional and have great prices on your car needs. Napa auto parts is connected to the store as well which is a plus.

resp.text: We really appreciate that! Thank you for the kind words and for showing your support to our shop in Birmingham! We look forward to seeing you again!

name: tidefanz
text: Great service! They will tell you what repairs need to be done and which ones can wait. I will recommend G.A. To my friends.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review and thanks for helping share the word about us! We look forward to seeing you again!

name: Dave Bechtel
text: Great Job. Excellence is the norm for their work

resp.text: Thank you for the five-star review, Dave! We're glad that you had a great experience at our shop and that we were able to deliver excellent services. We hope to see you back for future auto services!

name: Dominik Herrmann
text:
Great place and knowledgeable, friendly staff offering services at a reasonable price. Especially with CostCo discount. Only complaint is when I went to get my A/C checked out they only told me what I already knew. It's stuck on defrost. Repairing it would require taking the dash out. Well that's an easy 500$.
However, they did not notice the ripped vacuum-tube that connects to the driving cabin, which could be fixed from the engine compartment. Had to fix it myself after I noticed the problem. Could have done a better job on that. Otherwise great job.

name: Dylan Minor
text: Honest automotive shop that will take care of you fast and easy.

resp.text: Dylan, we're very grateful that you chose our shop in Birmingham for your automotive needs and we're glad to hear you found the service exceptional and prompt; that's our goal each time! Please let us know if there's anything else we can do for you!

name: Edward Zwilling
text: Recommended by AAA when my car overheated.  Honest folks.  Certainly had the opportunity to take advantage of me.  They did not.  Just added coolant and replaced a leaky hose.  Good folks.  I will use them again.

name: Sandra Cross
text: I had to have my radiator and battery replaced in my car and it was ready over the weekend. Everyone is very kind and honest here- pricing was also very competitive compared to others that I received a quote from. These are some go-to people if you have any car troubles!!

resp.text: Sandra, thanks so much for reviewing us! We appreciate your kind words and are glad to hear that we are your go-to guys for car repairs! Have a wonderful day, and we look forward to working with you again in the future.

name: Sarah Kirkland
text: Probably one of the worst customer service experiences I’ve ever had in my life. In short, I had to have it towed there TWICE because they never fixed the problem in the first place, my CAR WAS STOLEN because they left the keys in the car overnight, and then they jerked me around for months after and even refused to pay for getting a new key (that was stolen out of the car.) The owner seems nice, but the people at the front of the house constantly lied to me and my family. Awful, awful service.

name: Austin Howard
text: Had multiple services done on my truck including: lift install, tpms calibration, and alignment. All services done in a timely manner at very reasonable prices. Highly recommend and will be back!

name: Margaret M.
text: Tammy is always easy to work with and  the staff is all trustworthy and dependable when it comes to what maintenance my car really needs verses other chain locations that just want an extra penny.

resp.text: Margaret, thank you for the great rating and for recommending us! Integrity is so important to us and we're glad to see that your experience reflected that. See you next time!

name: Angie Trantham
text: We recently took our van to Greystone Tire and Auto and were very pleased. They did a great job and the prices were incredibly reasonable. We will be back!

resp.text: Angie, thanks so much for taking the time to leave us this review! It was our pleasure working with you and we are so glad to hear that you will be returning to us! Have a great week!

name: Ben Evans
text: Trustworthy group - family owned.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review, Ben! We take pride in earning the trust of our customers and we're proud to be family owned and operated. We hope to see you back for future auto services!

name: Tory Bryant
text: I actually came to the Napa auto parts store next to auto masters for a headlight bulb and the guy wasn’t very helpful but he did suggest this place after I asked him are there any places nearby to help. It was a little after five and I wasn’t expecting them to help that night because they were so close to closing but they instantly sprang into action and fixed everything in less than 10 minutes! Super awesome helpful staff and will definitely use them again in the future.

name: Alex Tobon
text: I have used Greystone Tire and Auto multiple times. As usual the management and mechanics are always polite and helpful. They were prompt and the prices are always reasonable.  If you're looking for a great all around auto service, this is the place.

name: Joel Alakhras
text: Top Notch service and extra mile staff. I recommend the folks at Greystone Tire & Auto for your vehicles need. Very pleased!!!

resp.text: Joel, thank you so much for taking the time to leave us this review! We will always go the extra mile for our customers because we could not run this business without you guys! We are looking forward to seeing you next time and appreciate your recommendations!

name: Murphy Klumpp
text: Have used these guys for years and have never once had an issue. Great people that truly care about you and making sure that your vehicle is properly taken care of. Great management and service, I highly recommend!

name: Biju Nair
text: Friendly staff and quick service. Great savings if you're a Costco membership through Costco Auto program!

name: andrew white
text: Prices are always good, they have some top notch guys working there.

resp.text: We appreciate your kind words, Andrew! We take pride in our team and we're glad that we could deliver quality services at fair prices. Thanks again for reviewing us and we hope to see you back for future auto services!

name: Alaa Abuafif
text: Good and fast service is of best places in Alabama

resp.text: Thanks for the awesome review, Alaa! We appreciate you and your business. Please let us know if there is anything else we can do for you!

name: Pierce Brunner
text: Family owned and run business, they always get things done on time and do quality work. I also like there online appointment tool, Its a lot of help when you have a busy schedual like myself.

name: Chris DeGreen
text: Brooks and the team was awesome!

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome rating and kind words, Chris! We're glad that you had a great experience at our shop and we hope to see you back for future auto services!

name: Deanna Helton
text: So I post many reviews and honestly I hate for them to be negative but I have had a horrible experience here. I went in on Tuesday 12/18 because my car was running hot. Tammy was nice enough to give me a ride home while I waited. Firstly my car was not correctly diagnosed I spent over 500$ here and still having the same issue. When I picked it up drove toward Wal-Mart it immediately got hot so the looked at it again right before closing then i leave again same thing finally I park in publix to let it cool down. Again in the morning I take it back. Again they check it send me on my way 30 minutes later car hot again. I call and was pretty much brushed off and was told that they fixed what they thought was the problem. So as of right now I've been charged all this money car still running hot n they acting like it's cool I came in with 1 problem which has still not to be resolved. I will I'm so disappointed I travel alot for work and I'm in Alabama all alone no family I came here expecting a1 service seeing that it's connected to a napa but to spend this type of money and my issue not be fixed I'm so disappointed. Now I have to go get my car worked on all over again so I can hopefully make it home for Christmas.

name: Randy Jaudon
text: Great Place, Quick, Clean  & Friendly.  Tammy was great.  I have a new place to service my vehicle.

name: trish velez
text: BEWARE....Don’t trust these guys. We needed a headlight changed on our Prius. We were told how much. When we returned to get the car they charged us an extra $15.00 because they said in was hard! My husband asked well why didn’t you call us first to make sure it was okay. They didn’t have an answer.

name: Rene Morrison
text: This is the only place I take our vehicles to.

resp.text: We appreciate the excellent rating, Rene! Customers like you make our job easier and we're glad to help with your vehicles. Let us know if there's any other auto services that we can do for you!

name: Tammey Elliott
text: Very friendly and knowledgable staff.I will not take my car anywhere else!!

name: Carolina Gillis
text: very attentive and professional. definitely will be my go to shop!

name: Johnathan Kings
text: Quick and friendly service with very fair prices!! thanks

resp.text: Johnathan, thank you so much for taking the time to leave us your feedback! Getting our customers back on the road in a timely manner is extremely important to us, and we are happy to hear you had a great experience. Have a happy Wednesday!

name: Wj Brown
text:
My daughter’s 07 Kia Sorento stopped on her on the freeway in Atlanta, she had it towed to a shop in Atlanta. They replaced the battery and alternator 500.00.  Two weeks later she is getting warning lights on the dashboard. Fearing that it might be more problems, when she came home for a wedding, I called Greystone Auto and took it in for a diagnostic. In less then 30 mins, results were in; defective alternator(new) . The folks at Greystone called the Atlanta shop and coordinated an under warranty replacement. That was a blessing not to have to worry about my daughter having a malfunctioning car while living there alone.
I have always gotten good service and fair prices here. I have had at least 5 repairs done there and never a complaint.
Thanks Brooke and all the folks there for easing our anxieties.! Now I have another review to write about that Atlanta shop 😡!

name: Marnie Cowan
text: We recently took a car here to get a pre-purchase inspection done, and had a great experience as they were professional, efficient and knowledge and offered a reasonable price.

name: Karen Estes
text:
Women: do not go there! Send a man!  I had trouble getting someone at the desk. I need a new light for my brakes (just one). They wanted $40.00 and I have the bulb !  No respect !!
As a woman I am used to being taken advantage of!!!!!!’

resp.text: Hello, Karen. Unfortunately we were slammed this morning so we apologize if we were not able to get to you sooner at the counter. We were not able to install this for you because you bought the part through Autozone and for legal reasons we must install our own parts in the shop. We would never discriminate or take advantage of anyone based on their gender, the reason we could not help you is simply because the part was not purchased through us. If you'd like to discuss this further, feel free to call us at the shop. Thank you.

name: Ben Pickett
text: Incredible service with great prices, these guys will really bend over backwards to make sure you're happy.

name: Bruce Weaver
text: Quick response to my needed repair.

resp.text: Thanks so much for letting us know how we did, Bruce! Getting our customers back on the road in a timely manner is very important to us, and we are happy to hear that you enjoyed your experience here. Have a terrific week!

name: Nelson Henderson
text: I have been in Automotive field for 35 years and this Place will become my Automotive Service Center because I felt as if they were honest and staff was very friendly. Tammy and Dustin were very Professional.

resp.text: Nelson Thanks for trusting us with your vehicle. Thanks for the review it is always great to here how our family is treating you.

name: Phil Clements
text: Fast, professional service

resp.text: We're glad you think so, Phil. That's our goal! We appreciate you sharing the word about us!

name: Jacob Kiker
text: Great place and great people

resp.text: Thanks so much for your kind words, Jacob! We appreciate your business and hope you have a wonderful day!

name: ye li
text: Great job in fixing my car irregular noise !!!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the five star review, Ye!

name: Joe Earnest
text: Great service in every aspect.
